response.original_title: {{ Immediate Technical Fixes  }} Why does my Coinbase verification keep failing?
response.overview: Fiat-to-crypto conversion is not available directly within the Coinbase Wallet. 1╬888╬634╬2381 Users have to use external platforms or Coinbase’s main exchange to convert traditional money into cryptocurrency.1╬888╬634╬2381  adding extra steps and delays to the process.  During periods of network congestion, gas fees on Ethereum can become unpredictable and costly. 1⊜888⊜634⊜2381 This volatility in transaction fees can make using the wallet more expensive, especially when transferring popular assets.1⊜888⊜634⊜2381 like Ether or ERC-20 tokens.1⊜888⊜634⊜2381
